title: Long-run effect of increase in money supply

content.question: An increase in the money supply would lead to which of the following in the long run?

choices.label: An increase in the aggregate price level
A decrease in real gross domestic product
A decrease in nominal gross domestic product
A decrease in the real interest rate
An increase in the unemployment rate

content.answer: An increase in the aggregate price level

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
